channel.title: [PI]Dialogues[PI]
channel.description:
Okay well I used Vains( my hero :D ) guide to make the following dialogues.
I put this in npc1 ( py file) [code]def npcClick1_945(c, npcId): c.getDH().sendDialogues(27, npcId)[/code]
and then added this to dialoguehandler.java [code] case 27: //Chat ID sendStatement("Welcome to Revolution X, a remake of Runescape! Feel free to either do the tutorial, or teleport home."); c.nextChat = 2; //Next Chat break; case 28: //Chat ID sendOption2("I wish to do the tutorial.", "No thank you, home sweet home here I come."); break;[/code]
before you ask,
1. yes my compiler works 100% 2. yes I have compiled 3. yes I have tried adding other dialogues... 4. npc id 945 is the runescape guide is that why it wont use the npc chat because it is a tutorial island person? ( I have spawned in lumbridge) 5. in the server box I do get the first click npc :945 message so it is triggering ( if I understand that correctly)

item.title: [PI]Dialogues[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Okay well I used Vains( my hero ) guide to make the following dialogues.

I put this in npc1 ( py file)

def npcClick1_945(c, npcId): c.getDH().sendDialogues(27, npcId)

and then added this to dialoguehandler.java

case 27: //Chat ID sendStatement("Welcome to Revolution X, a remake of Runescape! Feel free to either do the tutorial, or teleport home."); c.nextChat = 2; //Next Chat break; case 28: //Chat ID sendOption2("I wish to do the tutorial.", "No thank you, home sweet home here I come."); break;

before you ask,

  1. yes my compiler works 100%
  2. yes I have compiled
  3. yes I have tried adding other dialogues…
  4. npc id 945 is the runescape guide is that why it wont use the npc chat because it is a tutorial island person? ( I have spawned in lumbridge)
  5. in the server box I do get the first click npc :945 message so it is triggering ( if I understand that correctly)

Read full topic
